comment._content:
Thanks for these shots! Between this and the blog and the behind the scenes video on YouTube, you guys at the Brooklyn Museum are really doing a lot more than a lot of museums... it's wonderful to get to see the behind the scenes stuff, to feel like a little bit more of an insider, and a member of the community.

I look forward to visiting the museum again soon, to see the newly renovated exhibit.
